verses.text: Praise ye the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w**. Sing unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** a new song, and* his praise in the congregation of saints.+ 149.1 Praise…: Heb. Hallelujah*
Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.+ 149.2 in him…: Heb. in his Makers*
Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.+ 149.3 in…: or, with the pipe*
For the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.
Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.
Let* the high praises* of God be* in their mouth, and a twoedged sword in their hand;+ 149.6 mouth: Heb. throat*
To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and* punishments upon the people;
To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
To execute upon them the judgment written: this honour have all his saints. Praise ye the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w**.
